name: INMediaItemResolutionResult
desc: A resolution result for media item types.

items.name: class func success(with: INMediaItem) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a result that contains the media item that matches the user’s request.

items.name: class func successes(with: [INMediaItem]) -> [INMediaItemResolutionResult]
items.desc: Creates an array of results that contains the media items that match the user’s request.

items.name: class func confirmationRequired(with: INMediaItem?) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution requires the user to confirm the value before proceeding.

items.name: class func disambiguation(with: [INMediaItem]) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution requires the user to select from among the specified objects.
